programme.desc: Policeman Bong sees his past come back to haunt him when a sting is attacked by his former protégé.

programme.desc: A young assassin's debut mission entangles him in a plot, fleeing both government and rival assassins.

programme.desc: When traffickers kidnap her daughter, Hai Phuong returns to Saigon to take down the abductors.

programme.desc: They killed his wife. They killed his daughter. Now, Muay Thai expert Bai An (Tony Jaa) is coming for them.
